API_Description: The font family used to draw the text. It is an array of family names to be searched for in order. The first entry in the array is the font name of the font to use. The second entry is an optional generic family name to use if an exact match of the first font is not found. The generic family names are ``` symbol, serif, sans-serif, cursive, monospace, fantasy ``` The default generic family name is `sans-serif` .
